thread.title: Free! Trip guide for Lisbon, Portugal

author: eTN Editor
title: Free! Trip guide for Lisbon, Portugal
text:
Free! Trip guide for Lisbon, Portugal   
Aug 20, 2015 eTN   
YourWeekAway.com has released its newest destination report for travel consumers by adding a free 7-day trip guide for people interested in visiting Lisbon, Portugal. 
The free trip guide, titled "What To See And Do In Lisbon, Portugal" was prepared by Cacia Gil who serves as the areas resident curator. 
YourWeekAway.com creates free day-by-day trip planners which are written and maintained by local curators who live in the area and know it well. 
Lisbon is Europe's second-oldest capital (after Athens) and became the first true world city as the center of an empire spreading over all continents. It is now a beautiful coastal city known for its cafe culture and soulful music. It is also a city ruled by landscapes. Its thigh-burning hills combine to create a city of stunning vistas. Fortunately, the famous yellow trams may the journey somewhat easier. Locals are delightfully friendly and love to chat with visitors, often going out of their way to provide assistance.
